I

isDataAvailable() - Static method in class KeyboardReader
Determines whether data from the keyboard is waiting to be read.

J

JDBCAssignment - Class in <Unnamed>
Database assignment for CSCI 131 that allows a user to use a command line utility to update, change, and enter new assignment grades for a class.
JDBCAssignment() - Constructor for class JDBCAssignment
 

K

KeyboardReader - Class in <Unnamed>
KeyboardReader class for use in reading data from the keyboard and use in the remainder of CSCI 131 assignments.
KeyboardReader() - Constructor for class KeyboardReader
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class JDBCAssignment
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class KeyboardReader
Main method for testing of the KeyboardReader class.
